info.name: LilyB's - The Old Reader
info.description: A middle ground color scheme for The Old Reader. Not to dark and not to bright (hopefully).
info.additionalInfo: The Old Reader is a very minimalist site so I don't think I missed anything. But if I did then let me know and I'll see if I can fix it. I'm not entirely happy with the way it turned out but I think its still better than the default white and the dark black themes that others have made (no offense but really dark themes aren't much easier for me to read than very bright ones, is why I prefer gray themes).
